General.Name: Emperor Entertainment Hotel Limited
General.Description: Emperor Entertainment Hotel Limited, an investment holding company, provides entertainment and hospitality services in Macau and Hong Kong. The company operates Grand Emperor Hotel located in Macau Peninsula; and the Inn Hotel Macau located at Taipa Island, Macau. The company also operates Emperor Hotel in Wan Chai; and the Unit Serviced Apartments and MORI MORI Serviced Apartments in Hong Kong. In addition, it provides management and project financing services; hotel entertainment; VIP room services; catering services; and gaming-related marketing, public relation, and promotion services, as well as agency services for gaming operation. Further, the company leases investment properties. The company was formerly known as Emperor (China Concept) Investments Ltd. and changed its name to Emperor Entertainment Hotel Limited in January 2005. The company was incorporated in 1992 and is headquartered in Wan Chai, Hong Kong. Emperor Entertainment Hotel Limited is a subsidiary of Emperor Entertainment Hotel Holdings Limited.
General.Address: Emperor Group Centre, Wan Chai, Hong Kong
